title: Dividing Terms
text: Remember, we must start by dividing the first term of the divident by that of the divisor.

title: Multiplying Expressions
text: Now, we must multiply everything in the divisor by the quotient from the previous step and subtract. This cycle of \"division\" and \"multiplication\" will continue until the divident is of a lesser degree than the divisor.

title: Full Solution
text: If you're stuck, check your work with the full solution below (solution from Emath)\n##figure1.gif##
